name: Chicago Does Interactive Map

price_options.name: Picture listing
price_options.notes: Your business appears as a Picture Listing within the ChicagoDoes Interactive Video Map. This entry features your image and a QR code linking to your online listing with video, directions and actionable links (book, review, reserve). It’s ideal for brands seeking trusted visibility in hotel concierge-distributed print and immediate mobile engagement.

price_options.name: 1/4 panel
price_options.notes: With the 1/4 Panel, you get a dedicated quarter-panel print space on the map plus the QR-linked listing. You benefit from both physical presence in the hotel map and digital traffic via interactive content. A smart choice for businesses aiming for solid brand recognition and measurable leads.

price_options.name: 1/2 panel
price_options.notes: The 1/2 Panel doubles the print area compared to the ¼ Panel, giving you more room for imagery and messaging while still including the QR-driven listing. It’s perfect if you want stronger visual impact and deeper engagement from visitors who pick up the map and go online.

price_options.name: Panel
price_options.notes: The Full Panel gives you a full-panel allocation in the print map — maximum print presence short of cover. This comes with the interactive listing as well, combining dominant in-map visibility with mobile reach. Ideal for businesses ready to dominate the visitor map experience and drive real foot traffic.

price_options.name: Premium - Back Cover
price_options.notes: The Premium Back Cover is the highest-visibility placement within the ChicagoDoes Interactive Video Map. Your ad occupies the back cover of the printed map, distributed in 150+ hotels and partner locations. It includes the QR-linked online listing with video, directions and action links. This premium placement is designed for top-tier brands positioning themselves as leading in the Chicago visitor market.

rules: Highlight discounts baked into ratecard through frequency. They can save 17% off of 1x rate if they sign auto renew
They can save 10% by prepaying for the entire year  (we could give them 10% off on any ads that they prepay for if they don't want to prepay for the entire year)
Use trade as a tool to close if the trade is usable to Ateema. You can use up to 5% of the total program in trade. Must be collected before the first ad runs.
Seasonal businesses - sell picture listings in the offseason to keep their prices down but maintain a presence in both maps.
BASEMENT PRICING: For 1 ad - give them 2x rate, For 2 ads - give them 3x rate, For 3 ads - give them Auto-renew rate, For Auto-renew - give extra 2.5% off.

sales_strategy: Only Chicago visitor tool in hotels, multi-touch, multi-media, fairly priced, puts client in front of visitors and hotel staffs, and gives visitors all the information they need to choose our clients
product_description: The Chicago Does Interactive Video Map is a game-changing marketing tool that blends the trust of a printed hotel map with the engagement and immediacy of mobile video. It puts your business literally in the hands of visitors — and keeps you top of mind as they decide where to go, what to eat, and what to do. Whether they pick up the printed map from a concierge or scan a QR code on a table tent, your ad appears at the moment they’re ready to spend. The map is featured in 150+ hotels, big-bus stops and partner locations with quarterly print runs of 137,500 copies (550,000 annually). Each print ad includes a QR link to your mobile-friendly listing with video, directions, ticketing or reservation links, reviews and more — giving you both print credibility and digital action.
